name: yukikaze
normalized: uwaah～～
as soon as she opened the extravagant, western-style door and entered the room, yukikaze let out a surprised voice.

name: yukikaze
normalized: this is a dorm room?!
this luxuriousness, on top of it being a private room…

name: yukikaze
normalized: it really is different when you have money!
she looked around the inside with a face that was half-surprised, half-disgusted.
this place was seishuu academy, the girls' dorm for scholarship course students.
what had been allotted to yukikaze was a room on the second floor of that western-style building.
she had had an idea based on its outward appearance, which was like an aristocratic mansion in england or somewhere, but when she went in and looked, it was better than that.
for starters, it was spacious.
it seemed to be easily 30 square metres, or about 18 tatami mats in size.
high-quality antique western furniture had been set up in there.

name: yukikaze
normalized: wow, the bed is huge!
yukikaze placed her hand luggage on the floor, and sat down on the double bed, which seemed to have over twice the width of the bed in her own home.
――buyoyon…

name: yukikaze
normalized: amazing, so soft.
the superb-feeling mattress supported yukikaze's body, without being too hard or too soft.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah, this seems easy to sleep on.
after lying back in her uniform, spreading both arms and checking how comfortable it would be to sleep on, she sprang to her feet.

name: yukikaze
normalized: there's all kinds of furniture in place, too.
the dresser and closet are so big.
does everyone bring that many clothes?
even if yukikaze put in all the clothes at her house, it seemed like there would still be room left over.
when would she ever change clothes that much?
given that she would basically be in her uniform at school…
while thinking things like that, she checked out her appearance, having put that uniform on from the dresser which had caught her eye.

name: yukikaze
normalized: eheheh♪
unlike the bright-green uniform of gosha academy, the one for seishuu academy had a sedate colour and design appropriate for an elite school.
the length of the skirt was about the same.
the kneesocks looked white instead of her usual black.
her trademark red ribbons remained as they were.
the red tie, which had a white cross on it, matched the ribbons nicely.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yup, cute.
i'm cute.
she nodded to herself, while imagining what tatsurou would say.

name: yukikaze
normalized: this vanity could be a bit bigger.
i wonder if this unusually tiny mirror is tailored to nobles from the olden days?
after quickly fixing her bangs, she went back to her check of the room again.
in accordance with her first impression, it had the feeling of a suite modelled after an old western mansion.
of course, since this was a school dormitory, there were also a desk and chair for studying purposes.
they also had a classy antique look.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it seems almost like it's too nice to study on, though.
large windows at the front.
from there, one could look out over the forest that separated the general course students from the scholarship students, and the mountains that surrounded the entire school.

name: yukikaze
normalized: and the view is, well, not bad, i suppose.
it does have a feeling of being imprisoned, though.
while uttering those kinds of impressions, this time she tried opening the door that was on the left-hand side of the room.

name: yukikaze
normalized: washroom and toilet, huh?
still, it's got an up-to-date bidet.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i was wondering what to do if this place were old-fashioned too.
it's not like that, huh?

name: yukikaze
normalized: but there's no bath.
i wonder why they didn't put one in, even though it has the look of a foreign hotel.
strange.
yukikaze stated her impressions to herself, then closed the bathroom door and surveyed her room once again.
at any rate, this place would only be her lodgings during the infiltration.
the instant that she had entered, she had checked that there were no strange security cameras or listening devices.
if that kind of thing were here, it would be immediately clear to her, a lightning escape art user, since the nape of her neck would tingle.
it would be a serious matter if things like that were in seishuu academy, which was known as an elite school, and on top of that, in the scholarship student dormitories.
but, yukikaze had received a request from tatsurou and shizuru, the taimanin who had infiltrated this place ahead of her, and had come here to be in charge of “battles”.
she didn't know what had been planted where.
negligence was forbidden.
well, putting that aside――

name: yukikaze
normalized: （fufu, i wonder what kind of face tatsurou will make♪
yukikaze imagined tatsurou's surprise when they met face-to-face at school, and laughed to herself.
by all rights, there was no need for yukikaze to go undercover as a student.

the theory behind this sort of mission was that she would contact tatsurou and shizuru in secret, have a preparatory meeting about the “battle”, and seek to coordinate with them as she took care of that.
however, yukikaze had passed the exam to transfer to seishuu academy, and become a student here, like tatsurou.
this was because she wanted to see tatsurou's surprised face, and try wearing a uniform that was different from usual.
of course, there were also reasons why that was more advantageous for the mission.
if there weren't, she wouldn't get permission from the higher-ups.
not telling tatsurou was due to yukikaze's mischievousness, though.
however, she had gotten too serious on the test, and had ended up transferring to the scholarship course, not the general course, where tatsurou was.
that was why, today, she had finished the various formalities for her first day of school, and been guided to this gorgeous dormitory, which was exclusively for scholarship students.

name: yukikaze
normalized: well, i wonder what i should do for now?
her classes came after noon.
what would she do until then?
she sat on her soft, fluffy bed and started to think, when
――konkon.
she heard the sound of someone knocking on the door.

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh?
who is it…?
ah, okay, okay, okay!
yukikaze sprang to her feet and opened the door.

name: yukikaze
normalized: oh, kouchou-sensei (headmaster)――
there was washizu shigeru, chairman of the washizu group and headmaster of seishuu academy, as well as
a middle-aged man dressed in an expensive-looking suit, who stood behind him.
it was the first time she had seen his face.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （who's this old guy?

name: washizu
normalized: mizuki-san, i wondered if you liked your room?

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes, kouchou-sensei.
thank you very much for everything today.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i was surprised that the dorm room would be private, and so luxurious.

name: washizu
normalized: all of the scholarship students get special treatment, since they are to become elites among elites.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i like it a lot.
thank you very much.

name: washizu
normalized: that's good.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes.
yukikaze behaved like an honour student due to washizu, who gave the impression of an old headmaster who was truly devoted to education.
this washizu shigeru was the most important figure in this mission.
the chairman of the washizu group, a union of corporations derived from the pre-war washizu zaibatsu.
since retiring from the front line at age 70, with many large corporations under its umbrella, he had worked hard at the administration of the washizu school group educational corporation.

he was personally serving as headmaster at seishuu academy, which sought to rear the elites who would play key roles in japan's political and financial worlds, and did his utmost to educate young people.
he was ostensibly like that.
however, behind the scenes, he was an underworld fixer who had strong influence in political and business circles.
based on his youthful appearance, which didn't look like that of an 82-year-old, he was feared in those circles as “the youkai”.
and washizu shigeru had an uncle-nephew relationship with that yazaki muneichi, who was the eldest son of his late younger sister, yazaki hisako.
there was no way he was a decent person.
unlike yazaki muneichi, you couldn't see that at a glance, but conversely, that might have been part of why he was called “the youkai”.

name: yukikaze
normalized: incidentally, kouchou-sensei, who's that person?
yukikaze inquired, without throwing off her cheerful smile.

name: washizu
normalized: ah, his introduction is overdue, isn't it?
he is inui hideo.
inui-kun, she is mizuki yukikaze-san.
she's a genius girl, who passed the entrance exam with the highest score in history.

name: yukikaze
normalized: genius girl…
the man referred to as inui respectfully bowed his head to yukikaze, who made a show of looking embarrassed, despite thinking 「woo-hoo」 in her mind.

name: inui
normalized: it's nice to meet you, mizuki-sama.
my name is inui hideo.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm mizuki yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （mizuki-sama?
who is this guy?
while greeting him with a smile, she nonchalantly studied the man.
at a glance, she had thought he was just middle-aged and fat, but that wasn't the case.
he had a fit body, like that of a lower-ranking sumo wrestler.
age 40.
no, maybe higher.
he had a subdued air due to his calm smile.
however, as a taimanin, yukikaze knew full well that you couldn't tell anything about a person's true nature from their face.

name: inui
normalized: it is an honour to meet you.
by the order of washizu-sama, it has been decided that i will have the privilege of serving as yukikaze-sama's valet.

name: yukikaze
normalized: huh?
she reflexively went back to normal and let out a high-pitched voice.

name: yukikaze
normalized: y, you're my valet?
washizu began to explain to yukikaze, who smoothed over it like that in a panic.

name: washizu
normalized: as i explained some time ago, valets or maids wait on the scholarship students.

name: washizu
normalized: pupils on the maid course wait on the male students, and pupils from the valet course on the female students.
which means that over three years, they spend the time in a genuine master-and-servant relationship.

name: yukikaze
normalized: but, if i remember rightly, kouchou-sensei said before that the, uhh… masters and servants?
the pairs of scholarship course, maid course and valet course students were already arranged, and there was no one to be my partner…

name: washizu
normalized: indeed.
that's why we found you an able valet among our old boys.
that's inui here.

name: yukikaze
normalized: is that so…?

name: washizu
normalized: for a scholarship student, it would be a grave disadvantage not to have a maid or valet.
so now you can be relieved.

name: yukikaze
normalized: well… thank you for your consideration.
yukikaze said thanks, hiding the gloom in her mind.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （what's with that insane system?

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i don't get the point of attaching a woman to a man, and a man to a woman!

name: yukikaze
normalized: （usually, with something like that, it's same-sex, isn't it?
you know, like the 『onee-samas』 that you often get at girls' schools!

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i don't even want something like that, though.
i'm fed up with such an aristocratic system.
it's a hindrance to the mission, anyway.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （eh?
this old guy is going to be my valet?
he's always going to be at my side?
no way, i really don't want that!
yukikaze constantly cursed in her mind, while making an insincere smile at washizu, who was delighted, as if this were about him.

name: washizu
normalized: mizuki-san, i expect you have some confusion, but you will get used to life as a true elite.
well then, inui.
i will entrust you to take care of the rest.

name: inui
normalized: please leave it to me.
washizu left.
afterwards, it had become just yukikaze and inui.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （eh?!
eehh?!

name: inui
normalized: from here on, i am yukikaze-sama's valet.
it's a pleasure to meet you.

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh, yukikaze-sama…?
hahaha, i, i'm the one who should say that.
nice to meet you…
despite being hopelessly bewildered, yukikaze greeted him, whereupon

name: inui
normalized: now, allow me to put your luggage away.
inui suddenly barged into the room, and was about to touch yukikaze's bag.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey, that's fine!
i'll put it away!
yukikaze picked up her bag in a panic.
there were sensitive items inside her luggage, which she did not want to be seen by anyone.

name: inui
normalized: but, yukikaze-sama…
conversely, inui made a face that looked like he was bewildered by yukikaze's reaction.

name: yukikaze
normalized: no arguments.
i just arrived today, so i want to carefully memorize where i put what.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （and, i don't want my clothes and underwear touched!

name: yukikaze
normalized: so, i'll do it myself!
yukikaze said, flatly.
inui looked to have breathed a little sigh.

name: inui
normalized: there's no other choice.
since this is your first day, i will abstain from assisting you for the time being.

name: inui
normalized: however, me taking care of yukikaze-sama and yukikaze-sama accepting help from her valet are part of your class work.
it will not be this way next time.

name: yukikaze
normalized: o, okay… understood.

name: inui
normalized: now then, please excuse me.
when you have something for me to do, please summon me with that bell.
i will come immediately.

name: yukikaze
normalized: huh?
bell?

name: inui
normalized: it is by your bedside.
she looked in the direction that inui indicated, and there certainly was the button for a bell beside her bed.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah, okay… got it.

name: inui
normalized: do excuse me, yukikaze-sama.
inui bowed his head respectfully, and went away.

name: yukikaze
normalized: a summoning bell…
were there similar things in all the scholarship students' rooms?
were the maids and the valets waiting for the calls?

name: yukikaze
normalized: …weird school.
she had suddenly become concerned about the future.

name: yukikaze
normalized: haah…
yukikaze breathed a deep, deep sigh.
and so, that afternoon――

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm mizuki yukikaze.
starting today, i'm looking forward to working with you at seishuu academy.
it's nice to meet you, everyone.
after that conventional greeting, yukikaze's life as a seishuu academy scholarship student had started.
the scholarship students had special treatment, so the dormitory and school building were completely isolated from those of tatsurou and the general course students.
they were separated by a forest and a river, which ran through the middle of the grounds, and general course students were not even allowed to step into the scholarship student area.
naturally, the maid course and valet course students, who obeyed the scholarship students, were also over here.
the course curriculum began with the sort of things they would do at any school, such as english, mathematics, japanese, and so forth.

apart from that, one could freely choose various curricula meant for developing elites in every field: literature, history, industrial trades, economics, government, management, finance, drama, music, singing, etc.

of course, the field of sports was also catered to, and there was a track-and-field ground, a baseball diamond, a tennis court, an indoor pool in the gymnasium, and, on top of that, even a horse riding area and a golf course.

it had the feeling of an elite school, as one would expect, but there were also courses that were clearly for aristocratic interests, such as ladies' and gentlemen's etiquette, high society training, and ballroom dance practice.
yukikaze had been added to the scholarship students, but before she arrived, there had been precisely 120 of them.
specifically, there were 40 people in the first-year class, 20 girls and boys apiece.

pairs were established for every single scholarship student (maid course students for the boys, and valet course students for the girls), so there were 20 first-years in each course, and (like the scholarship students) 120 in total.
yukikaze had been assigned to the first year.
a 121st scholarship student was an irregularity.
there was no way that she wouldn't be showered with attention.
or so she thought, but for some reason, the attention was concentrated more on that valet than yukikaze herself.

name: aya
normalized: mizuki-san, i heard that they made the inui hideo your valet.
is that true?
tennouji aya asked, in a calm voice.
at a glance, it was obvious that she was the daughter of a good family, and she was a model japanese beauty, with black hair that went down to her waist.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah… it was arranged by kouchou-sensei, since there was no one to pair with me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i don't want a guy like that, though…）
despite talking spitefully about him in her mind, yukikaze smiled pleasantly, as if she were also a quiet ojou-sama type.

name: reiko
normalized: well, that's fortunate, isn't it?
this girl, who had a naturally calm and gentle air, was hououin florence reiko.
she was a girl with a supermodel figure, which, since her mother was french, had an unusual make-up, no matter how one looked at it.
naturally, she had huge breasts.

name: yukikaze
normalized: is it?

name: megumi
normalized: it appears you don't know anything, eh?
even among the valets of seishuu academy, inui hideo is especially excellent.
this girl, who gave the impression that she was looking down on yukikaze in some way, was kanzaki megumi.
she also appeared to come from a noted family, but based on her sudden condescending attitude, she was the type yukikaze couldn't really come to like.

name: yukikaze
normalized: looks like it.
kouchou-sensei said he was an able old boy.

name: akane
normalized: far from able.
he's the legendary valet.
this girl was mizuhara akane.
her shortly-cut hair suited her well, and she had a really amiable feeling, so it seemed like one could become friends with her immediately.

name: yukikaze
normalized: legendary valet?

name: izumi
normalized: scholarship students who have been served by inui hideo always become proper ladies.
perfect ladies, in mind and body.
said kawase izumi, who had a childlike face and a similarly tiny body, like that of a small animal.
yukikaze had thought that she had seen her somewhere before, and it seemed that, since her parents were celebrities, she had even appeared on television as a child actor.

name: yukikaze
normalized: proper ladies…?

name: yukikaze
normalized: （what are they talking about…?

name: maiko
normalized: that's good, isn't it, mizuki-san?

name: ayu
normalized: yeah, i'm jealous.
kisaragi maiko and tokuda ayu, two people who certainly seemed to be close friends (and had very similar airs when lined up next to each other), gazed at her with looks of envy.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （uu… what an unpleasant turn of events.

name: reika
normalized: to be given inui hideo directly by kouchou-sensei!
mizuki-san is a most outstanding person, isn't she?

name: yukikaze
normalized: （there it is.
female bitterness…）
houjou reika, the daughter of the head of a large corporation, whom even yukikaze knew about.
yukikaze didn't know why, but due to the sense of rivalry that she had suddenly made bare, she seemed like she was going to be a bit of a pain.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i just happened to get good marks by accident.
i'm really worried about whether someone like me can get along with you all.

name: shiori
normalized: relax.
a valet as good as inui hideo would have a lot to teach my own servant.
said nishizono shiori, a girl who, from a glance, had a different air to her, since she had been living in europe the whole time before she entered seishuu academy.

name: miyuki
normalized: mine too.
mizuki-san, i look forward to working with you from now on♪
the one who smiled cheerfully was satou miyuki.
in the midst of nothing but the daughters of old nobility, prestigious families, the heads of large corporations and so on, this girl had said that she was of common birth, and was quite relaxed.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yes.
i look forward to working with you.
yukikaze bowed her head commendably, but even after that, she was talked to by 20 girls one after another.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （uu… this has gotten tiresome…）
it seemed that not just this time, but on every occasion that an irregularity occurred, he was called upon, and trained outstanding scholarship students to be ladies.
what she had discovered was that, here, it was a very wonderful thing for that old guy named inui hideo to become your valet.
in other words, the girls had become jealous of yukikaze all of a sudden.
as proof of that, considering how much she was told, 「let's be friends,」 after class, she was alone before she knew it.
it might not have been the case that everybody had intentionally ignored her, but it was certain that she wasn't invited by anyone, either.

name: yukikaze
normalized: well… i don't have to be depressed, though, do i?
she was used to this kind of treatment.
she had felt like this even at her alma mater, gosha academy.
born to the prestigious 『mizuki house』, she was said to be the strongest lightning escape art user in history, and the youngest taimanin ever.
people either fawned over her strangely, or conversely showed an unpleasant sense of antagonism.
and on top of that, they were usually older, so she couldn't even try to make friends the same age.
the only ones who normally conversed with yukikaze were rinko-senpai, who seemed to be in a similar position, and her younger brother tatsurou, who was her childhood friend.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （childhood friend, or should i say, boyfriend.
kind of… eheh♪
as far as she had heard, it seemed that tatsurou had been performing his mission pretty well on his own.
however, in front of yukikaze, he was the same old weak-kneed, perpetually unassertive tatsurou.
even so, lately, despite his timidity, he had shown serious affection towards yukikaze.
recently, she had been kissed by tatsurou for the first time.
but in truth, she wanted him to try a little harder, and become more assertive.
he was a boy, after all.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i wonder what tatsurou's doing about now…）
even though they were on a mission together for the first time in a while, they had been separated by the general course and the scholarship course.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …i want to meet you…
she muttered without thinking.
yukikaze blushed at herself, when
somebody came into the classroom, as though they had been waiting for her to be alone.

name: shizuru
normalized: you're our helper, huh?
the lightning strike taimanin.
i've heard the rumours.
a woman in glasses said, the moment she saw yukikaze.
yukikaze's heart pounded for a moment, but this was a face she had seen in a document.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah… are you kousaka-san?

name: shizuru
normalized: yes, i'm kousaka.
kousaka shizuru.
nice to meet you.
shizuru said, in a frank tone of voice.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm mizuki yukikaze.
nice to meet you.
yukikaze also smiled back.
codename: “flower shizuru”.
a user of the tree escape arts, who spawned vegetation at will and manipulated it.
an infiltration mission specialist.
being gifted with both genius and beauty, she communicated in six languages and had two doctorates, with expert knowledge spanning dozens of fields.
she was a jack-of-all-trades, and a skilled taimanin who excelled at dangerous solo infiltration missions.
based on that kind of personal history, yukikaze was expecting that she would be the hard-to-please type, but judging from appearances, she gave a quite different impression.
her incredible figure was as documented, but the air of the actual person standing before yukikaze's eyes was more gentle than she had imagined.
based on the documentation, her age was 24, but given her colourful circular glasses and her pigtails, which were bunched up with scrunchies, she looked more childlike than that.
it was every bit the “friendly teacher” feeling.
maybe that was being put on for the sake of the mission, but she seemed more easygoing than the constant full-force strictness type, like murasaki-sensei, whom yukikaze disliked.

name: shizuru
normalized: how about it?
what do you think about this school?
shizuru asked, like she understood yukikaze's feelings.
her eyes were laughing, 『you can't go on like this, right?

name: yukikaze
normalized: honestly!
i'm fed up.
an old man valet's going to be assigned to me.
“valet”.

name: shizuru
normalized: ahaha, that's because you're moving in on the scholarship course.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i figured that would be better, but it went wrong.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it appears that person is a legendary valet, and i'm envied by all the girls in the class.
thanks to that, i'm suddenly all alone after my first day.

name: shizuru
normalized: ara, that's tough.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it is tough, or maybe i should say bothersome.

name: shizuru
normalized: i understand.
i have a lot of bothersome stuff too.
shizuru shrugged her shoulders, with a face that said that they were companions in misery.
however, she wasn't grumbling about how annoying it was.

name: shizuru
normalized: anyway, get used to it, okay?
there are facilities that only scholarship students can enter, so i expect it'll come in handy for something.

name: yukikaze
normalized: this really is aristocratic, isn't it?
i hate it.

name: shizuru
normalized: you're right.
but i've only reached the point where i can enter the elite building recently, so i want to leave probing around here to you, the student.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you call this place the elite building?

name: shizuru
normalized: everyone calls it that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ugh.
yukikaze made a face that was truly fed up.
what were they thinking, calling themselves something like the elite building?
were they idiots?

name: shizuru
normalized: don't make a face like that.
you've become a scholarship student, so you need to behave like an elite.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i know.
this is a mission, after all.
well, if i have a chance, i'll search around the “elite building”.

name: shizuru
normalized: fu.
shizuru laughed a little at yukikaze, who emphasized “elite building” theatrically, but
all of a sudden, she stiffened her facial expression.
yukikaze realized the reason straight away.
someone had approached the classroom.
however, they were still a fair distance from them.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （ah… this person's amazing…）
yukikaze was impressed that shizuru had sensed their presence before she had.
she truly was an infiltration expert.

name: shizuru
normalized: mizuki-san, please go back early and rest today.
shizuru said, in a perfect teacher tone of voice, and handed over a tiny note that had been folded in half.
when yukikaze opened it, shizuru's dormitory room number was written down, along with the time of a briefing session tomorrow.
it was written in special taimanin ink, and would disappear little by little when it came into contact with the air.

name: yukikaze
normalized: kousaka-sensei, thank you very much.
yukikaze replied like a student, quickly looking over the memo and memorizing its contents, then promised to be there and threw it in the trash can before the ink disappeared.

name: shizuru
normalized: if there's anything you can't get used to, do ask me about it, mizuki-san.
well, goodbye.

name: yukikaze
normalized: goodbye, kousaka-sensei.
shizuru went out and left the classroom.
as if switching places with her, yukikaze's valet, inui, entered.

name: inui
normalized: yukikaze-sama, i have been waiting outside the school building, but you were slow to emerge, so i came to meet you.

name: inui
normalized: it appears that you've been conversing with kousaka-sensei.
has there been some kind of trouble?

name: yukikaze
normalized: nah, she was just teaching me a few things.
she replied, while thinking, “you don't have to come, and yet…”

name: inui
normalized: is that so?
well then, i will hold your bag.
inui said, and tried to take yukikaze's bag in his hand.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's fine!
i can do this much…
yukikaze picked up the bag herself, due to her revulsion towards having her personal property touched, but this time inui didn't back down.

name: inui
normalized: yukikaze-sama, this is my duty.
if i cannot fulfill my duty…

name: yukikaze
normalized: （ah, man, he's irritating…）

name: yukikaze
normalized: you're going to say that inui-san will be reprimanded by kouchou-sensei, and opinion of me will drop as well, right?!
i get it!
then, take it, please!

name: inui
normalized: thank you for understanding.
yukikaze reluctantly held out her bag, and inui took it respectfully, as if he were receiving a jewelry box.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i'm seriously fed up…）
even while breathing a sigh in her mind, yukikaze thought about the note from just before.
a briefing session in shizuru's room meant that there was no doubt that tatsurou would also show up.
she would be able to meet tatsurou tomorrow night.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i wonder how tatsurou's doing?
i'll get to see him tomorrow night, so i'm looking forward to it.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （but, i'd better search for other ways to meet with tatsurou, hadn't i?

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i'm sure he really wants to see me, too!

name: yukikaze
normalized: （there's a risk of interception when calling him on my cell… mm, i wonder what i should do?
yukikaze thought a little, and tried asking inui, who had become her luggage carrier.

name: yukikaze
normalized: say, inui-san.

name: inui
normalized: yes, what is it?

name: yukikaze
normalized: um, i'm wondering, how can i get to the general course?
yukikaze asked, as nonchalantly as possible, but inui answered thusly, without changing his expression one bit.

name: inui
normalized: yukikaze-sama, interaction between the scholarship students and the general course students is fundamentally prohibited.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i understand that, but i just got here.
i want to have a little look at what's going on over there.

name: inui
normalized: do you have a friend in the general course, or something?

name: yukikaze
normalized: w, well, that's right, but…
for a second, she had thought about answering 『i have no friend there』, but stopped.
if inui accompanied her to the general course as her valet, he would find out that she had lied when she met and talked to tatsurou, and it would seem suspicious.
she judged that she could probably just say she had a friend there.

name: inui
normalized: if you're going to meet a general course student, i think it would be best to head to the cafeteria for the general course students at lunch break.

name: yukikaze
normalized: cafeteria?

name: inui
normalized: that's correct.
the cafeteria that the general course students use is a facility that students from any course are permitted to make use of.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah, i see.

name: inui
normalized: the scholarship students, of course, usually use their own private dining hall, though.

name: inui
normalized: school regulations do not prohibit scholarship students from making use of the general course students' cafeteria.
the reverse is not allowed, however.

name: yukikaze
normalized: in other words, i'm free to go there from here.

name: inui
normalized: yes.
there are also exclusive dining halls for valets and maids, but in my own student days, my best friend was in the general course, so i often made use of the general course student cafeteria.
inui said, and winked at yukikaze.
the middle-aged man's wink was frankly disgusting, but yukikaze was grateful for his flexibility.

name: yukikaze
normalized: so there's a loophole.
thanks for telling me.

name: inui
normalized: it is a valet's duty to serve his master.
inui bowed his head respectfully.
it didn't change the fact that she was fed up with that attitude, but it seemed he wasn't all that stubborn.
she felt just a little relieved.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （well then, i think i'll go to the general course cafeteria at lunch tomorrow and look for tatsurou.
yukikaze decided.
